mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_TB ( RES_CD, RES_EMAIL_ID, RES_NAME, RES_PHONE, RES_NUM_OF_PEO, CHECK_IN_DT, CHECK_OUT_DT, CK_RES_ST, RES_REG_DT, ROOM_NO, MEM_NO ) VALUES ( #{resCode}, #{resEmail}, #{resName}, #{resPhone}, #{resNumOfPeo}, #{checkInDt}, #{checkOutDt}, 'PROCESSING', SYSDATE, #{roomNo}, #{memNo}, )
